sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>
      Customers
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-text-field
          v-model="search"
          append-icon="mdi-magnify"
          label="Search"
          single-line
          hide-details
      ></v-text-field>
    </v-card-title>
    <v-data-table
        :headers="headers"
        :items="users"
        :search="search"
    ></v-data-table>
    <UserDialog
        :opened="dialogVisible"
        :user="selectedUser"
        @refresh="refreshList"
    ></UserDialog>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import api from "../api";
import UserDialog from "../components/UserDialog";
export default {
  name: "CustomerList",
  components: { UserDialog },
  data() {
    return {
      users: [],
      search: "",
      headers: [
        {
          text: "Username",
          align: "start",
          sortable: false,
          value: "name",
        },
        { text: "AvgEC", value: "averageEnergyConsumption" },
        { text: "MaxEC", value: "maxEnergyConsumption" },
        { text: "Description", value: "description" },
        { text: "Location", value: "location" },
      ],
      dialogVisible: false,
      selectedUser: {},
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async refreshList() {
      this.user = await api.user.getDevices(this.user.id);
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.refreshList();
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
